akka.actor.mailbox
Class DurableMailboxSpec

java.lang.Object
  akka.testkit.TestKit
      akka.actor.mailbox.DurableMailboxSpec
All Implemented Interfaces:
TestKitBase
public abstract class DurableMailboxSpec
extends TestKit

Reusable test fixture for durable mailboxes. Implements a few basic tests. More tests can be added in concrete subclass.

Subclass must define dispatcher in the supplied config for the specific backend. The id of the dispatcher must be the same as the `-dispatcher`.
